section.p: The Shell integration with provides for an Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) solution that allows users to install any software or execute any task in a UNIX environment by running Shell scripts from services, which are published on a marketplace. For example, users can request and use scripts for provisioning virtual systems in the cloud. The cloud usage costs are calculated and charged by means of the billing and payment services.
This manual describes how to execute Shell scripts from services on an marketplace.
